scripts.dev:stop: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ports=3000,3001; $pids=Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort $ports -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess -Unique | Where-Object { $_ -and $_ -ne 0 }; if ($pids) { Stop-Process -Id $pids -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } else { Write-Host 'No dev server process found on ports 3000/3001.' }; $lockPath='C:\Users\User\Documents\Workspaces\Reelio\apps\web\.next\dev\lock'; if (Test-Path $lockPath) { Remove-Item $lockPath -Force }"
scripts.check: npm run format && npm run lint && npm run typecheck
